data.comment: The match has started.
Barcelona to take a throw-in in Real Madrid territory.
In the minute 3, Throw-in for Barcelona in the half of Real Madrid.
Throw-in for Real Madrid at Camp Nou.
Federico Valverde puts the ball in the net and the away team now lead 0-1.
In the minute 5, Karim Benzema instrumental with a fine assist.
Vinicius Junior for Real Madrid gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Barcelona at Camp Nou.
Barcelona awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 8, Goal! Barcelona go level at 1-1 through Ansu Fati in Barcelona.
Jordi Alba with an assist there.
In the minute 10, Juan Martinez Munuera signals a free kick to Real Madrid in their own half.
Free kick for Real Madrid in their own half.
Juan Martinez Munuera signals a free kick to Barcelona.
In the minute 13, Juan Martinez Munuera signals a throw-in for Barcelona, close to Real Madrid's area.
Throw-in for Barcelona in their own half.
Philippe Coutinho gets his shot on target but fails to score for Barcelona.
In the minute 17, Barcelona awarded a free kick in their own half.
Juan Martinez Munuera awards the home team a throw-in.
Barcelona's Lionel Messi gets in a shot on goal at Camp Nou. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 19, Casemiro (Real Madrid) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Real Madrid have been awarded a corner by Juan Martinez Munuera.
Corner awarded to Real Madrid.
In the minute 23, Sergio Ramos of Real Madrid smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Real Madrid pushes forward through Karim Benzema, whose finish on goal is saved.
Juan Martinez Munuera signals a free kick to Barcelona in their own half.
In the minute 27, In Barcelona a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Clement Lenglet is booked for the home team.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 34, Juan Martinez Munuera signals a Real Madrid throw-in in Barcelona's half.
Barcelona awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Barcelona in the half of Real Madrid.
In the minute 37, Nacho for Real Madrid has been booked by Juan Martinez Munuera and receives a first yellow card.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Barcelona.
Juan Martinez Munuera awards Barcelona a goal kick.
In the minute 39, Free kick Real Madrid.
Barcelona have a goal kick.
In the minute 43, Free kick for Barcelona in their own half.
Free kick Barcelona.
Lucas Vazquez is replacing Nacho for the away team.
Real Madrid have been awarded a corner by Juan Martinez Munuera.
In the minute 45, 2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Juan Martinez Munuera blows to end the first-half.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
In the minute 47, Corner awarded to Real Madrid.
Real Madrid have been awarded a corner by Juan Martinez Munuera.
Real Madrid attack but Sergio Ramos's header doesn't find the target.
In the minute 48, Ball goes out of play for a Barcelona goal kick.
Can Barcelona get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Real Madrid's half?
Real Madrid's Casemiro gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 51, Barcelona have a goal kick.
Barcelona's Ansu Fati misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Real Madrid at Camp Nou.
In the minute 52, Throw-in Real Madrid.
Can Real Madrid get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Barcelona's half?
Barcelona's Philippe Coutinho attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
In the minute 54, It's a goal kick for the away team in Barcelona.
Free kick for Barcelona in their own half.
Real Madrid awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 57, Ball safe as Real Madrid is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Real Madrid are pushing forward but Karim Benzema's finish is wide of the goal.
Juan Martinez Munuera awards Barcelona a goal kick.
In the minute 59, Real Madrid are in shooting range from this free kick.
Jordi Alba (Barcelona) has received a first yellow card.
Penalty! Juan Martinez Munuera points to the spot, great chance for Real Madrid...
In the minute 63, Sergio Ramos nets and Real Madrid now lead 1-2. The goal came from the penalty spot.
Corner awarded to Real Madrid.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 68, Federico Valverde is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Corner awarded to Barcelona.
In the minute 69, Barcelona have been awarded a corner by Juan Martinez Munuera.
Zinedine Zidane (Real Madrid) is making a second substitution, with Luka Modric replacing Federico Valverde.
Corner awarded to Barcelona.
Philippe Coutinho (Barcelona) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 70, Can Barcelona capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Real Madrid's half?
Throw-in for Real Madrid at Camp Nou.
Federico Valverde has recovered and rejoins the match in Barcelona.
In the minute 73, Throw-in Barcelona.
Ball goes out of play for a Real Madrid goal kick.
Ball safe as Real Madrid is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 76, In Barcelona a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Barcelona have been awarded a corner by Juan Martinez Munuera.
Can Barcelona capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In the minute 80, Important block from the Real Madrid defence as Lionel Messi fires in a strike for Barcelona.
Barcelona have been awarded a corner by Juan Martinez Munuera.
Corner awarded to Barcelona.
In the minute 82, Rodrygo is on a sub for Marco Asensio for Real Madrid.
Barcelona make their first substitution with Antoine Griezmann replacing Ansu Fati.
Trincao is replacing Sergio Busquets for Barcelona at Camp Nou.
In the minute 82, Ronald Koeman is making the team's third substitution at Camp Nou with Ousmane Dembele replacing Pedri.
Real Madrid have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Barcelona in the half of Real Madrid.
In the minute 86, In Barcelona Real Madrid drive forward through Toni Kroos. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Real Madrid's Toni Kroos is on target but unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Real Madrid.
In the minute 86, Sergio Ramos (Real Madrid) strikes at Camp Nou but his header is cleared.
Raphael Varane (Real Madrid) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Ball goes out of play for a Barcelona goal kick.
In the minute 87, Real Madrid drives forward and Vinicius Junior gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Juan Martinez Munuera awards the home team a throw-in.
Goal kick for Barcelona at Camp Nou.
In the minute 89, In Barcelona Barcelona attack through Ousmane Dembele. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Barcelona.
Barcelona have been awarded a corner by Juan Martinez Munuera.
Juan Martinez Munuera signals a Barcelona throw-in in Real Madrid's half.
Real Madrid awarded a throw-in in their own half.
At Camp Nou the fourth official shows that 5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
The match is over. Final score 1-3.
Goal! Real Madrid extend their lead to 1-3 through Luka Modric.
That's a fine assist from Rodrygo.
Lionel Messi (Barcelona) gets a yellow card.
